analysis.description:
daoPOLSKAtokens.FundsTransfer (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#440-444) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! owner.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#443-444)

Reentrancy in daoPOLSKAtokens.sendTokenAw (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#372-381):
	External calls:
	- t.coinContract.transfer(receiver,amount) (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#380-381)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numTransfers (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#381)

daoPOLSKAtokens.sendTokenAw (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#372-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-t.coinContract.transfer(receiver,amount) (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#380-381)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#71-79) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#12-13)
daoPOLSKAtokens.fundingEndBlock should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#388)
daoPOLSKAtokens.migrationAgent should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#170-171)
daoPOLSKAtokens.tokenCreationRate should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#383-385)
